item.title: Running Browsers In The Cloud | Selenium webdriver nodejs
item.description: This post (Running Browsers In The Cloud) is part of a series about Selenium WebDriver with Node.js . If you’ve ever needed to test features in an older browser like Internet Explorer 9 or 10 then odds are you ran a virtual machine (VM) on your computer with a “legit” version of Windows.
